abilities.name: War Stance
abilities.details: Wars's basic attacks and Onslaught deal a percentage of the damage as physical damage (scaling with physical power) to enemies in a cone behind the primary target (cleave damage).

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.details:
Wars swings his war-glaive in a powerful, three-part sequence, culminating in a devastating final blow.

On the first cast, Wars thrusts his glaive in a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit.

On the second cast, Wars performs a 360-degree swing around himself, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies in a ring around him.

On the third cast, Wars leaps to a target area, slamming his glaive down, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and briefly fearing enemies hit.

abilities.name: Conqueror
abilities.details: Wars gains increased life steal and movement speed for a short duration. In addition, Wars also deals increased damage to enemies who are below a certain percentage of their maximum health or the target marked by Augury.

abilities.name: Augury
abilities.details:
Wars marks the target enemy hero, reducing the target's movement speed and attack speed that continues to increase every second over a duration.

The marked target can remove the mark by dealing a fixed amount of damage to Wars within the duration.

abilities.name: Dominion
abilities.details:
Wars swings his glaive, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) in a circular zone around him and instantly creating a Dominion zone for a few seconds, becoming immune to all damage and negative effects originating from enemies outside the zone.

If there is a target marked by Augury, Wars can leap to the target's location, dealing the same damage and creating the Dominion zone upon landing. In addition, all nearby enemies who are not marked by Augury will be pushed out of the zone upon its creation.
